post.text:
Donald Trump has spent years peddling lies about President Obama.

And that didn't stop today.

comment.author: Emelia
comment.text: About the same amount she was careless with our security. Let's not keep track of the yrs she has been telling lies about other subjects. And we will not bring up the fact that in 08 she also played the same card.

replies.author: Christina
replies.text: joseph you better mention Benghazi , someone may have forgotten about it. SMFH

replies.author: Emelia
replies.text: Its an extremely long list. Forget the list for a moment. Why would anyone vote for another 4 yrs of BOs work in the WH? I am proud to say i never voted for him and will be proud to say the i did not vote for Clinton.

replies.author: Stephen
replies.text: Yawn! Really boring. Rice and Powell did the same thing, we are tired of your witch hunt.
